name: Lan
description: She often explores dangerous situations by herself.

set.2: When equipped with at least 1 flame weapon, increase flame ATK by **6%**/7%/8%/9% and flame damage by **3.2%**/3.8%/4.4%/5%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Gain different effects based on the number of different elemental weapons equipped: Increase flame/frost/physical/volt damage by **4%**/5%/6%/7% for every flame/frost/physical/volt weapon equipped. Increase final damage by **5%**/6%/7%/8% for every altered weapon equipped. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
